creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
text:
When many custom tags included in a JSP page, the _jspService() method can grow 
beyond the Java 64K method limit.

Possible workaround: split _jspService() method. The fix won't be easy given 
the current jasper implementation.
Would require refactoring of the current jasper architecture.
creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com

text: 4.1.4 will include a fix for this.
creator: remm@apache.org
